lead_paragraph: Ignore the puppets for a moment. Set aside the narrative of a ragtag team of incompetent pirates. And look past the fact that the two men behind the videos featuring the pirates refuse to identify themselves.
snippet: Two men, artists in their 30s, swear they have buried somewhere in New York a wooden chest containing $10,000 in golden dollar coins. If you find it, you can keep it. Just watch their puppet videos.

headline.main: The Pirates Are Puppets, but the Treasure (They Say) Is Real

abstract: Two men, artists in their 30s, swear they have buried somewhere in New York a wooden chest containing $10,000 in golden dollar coins. If you find it, you can keep it. Just watch their puppet videos.
